title: 'Sunderland 'Til I Die'
description:
If you're missing live soccer right now, 'Sunderland 'Til I Die' is a great soccer docuseries to fill that need. It's in the same vein as 'All or Nothing,' 'First Team: Juventus,' and 'The English Game.' 

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Kevin Clark
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
